pr_title: clues: add location descriptions for MapClues

timeline.body: "Outside Varrock East Mine" to match the beginner map clue description. Perhaps making this string a constant (along with "West of the Champions' Guild") to reduce duplication would be a  good idea?
timeline.bodyText: "Outside Varrock East Mine" to match the beginner map clue description. Perhaps making this string a constant (along with "West of the Champions' Guild") to reduce duplication would be a  good idea?
timeline.bodyHTML: "Outside Varrock East Mine" to match the beginner map clue description. Perhaps making this string a constant (along with "West of the Champions' Guild") to reduce duplication would be a good idea?

timeline.body: "Fairy ring" is not Title Cased, or specially cased in any way. Hence, this and other cases should be in the form "... Fairy ring ALS"

timeline.message: clues: update BeginnerMapClue to use MapClue description constants

timeline.body:
```suggestion
		new MapClue(CLUE_SCROLL_HARD_7239, new WorldPoint(3021, 3912, 0), "South-east of the Wilderness Agility Course in level 50 Wilderness."),
```
timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
